title: [K-12] Learning Analytics (LA)-Driven Advanced Language Curriculum Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Curriculum Design Principles and Language Education Experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment where participants engage in real-time learning data collection and analysis using personal devices

learning_goals: Derive at least three patterns of engagement and achievement among language learners through learning analytics.
Incorporate learner needs analysis results, obtained via qualitative research techniques (interviews), into curriculum design.
Develop at least two personalized language learning strategies using individual device data.
Formulate an implementation plan considering the system characteristics and societal impact of learning analytics tools.

resources: Learning analytics software (e.g., Google Analytics for Education)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
